attributes.action: hold an INDEPENDENT inquiry into the arrest of Damian Green MP
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: a FULL totally independent inquiry should be held to investigate the extent of government involvement in the shameful arrest of Damian Green, opposition MP. At the same inquiry, the apparent politicisation of the police should be called into question.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
